title: Marketing MOOC Learning Experience Optimization Course

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A course exploring effective online learning strategies through the analysis of marketing MOOC learning experiences based on language domains.

learning_goals: Learners can identify the 'content quality' and 'value perception' elements in MOOC content evaluations with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can provide at least three types of feedback on instructor communication techniques and content delivery methods.
Learners can analyze at least two major issues in peer assessment systems and propose improvement measures.
Learners can construct a design framework that balances 'task load' and 'structured learning experiences' when designing MOOCs.
Learners can execute digital learning resource utilization strategies divided into three stages: exploration, evaluation, and application.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
